title: (x) Sun Microsystems "Simplify. Automate." narrow sans - Sun {Mike D}
content:
Hello again,

I'm sure this isn't obscure I'm just having trouble picking out the exact typeface used.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021145344im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_5221.png)

It's taken from a banner ad by Sun microsystems here:  
 [http://static.fmpub.net/banners/1/6001d3c9500bbf407840d2982f64ade2/33112...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021145344/http:/static.fmpub.net/banners/1/6001d3c9500bbf407840d2982f64ade2/33112701646ae625f485fa-07-861_SunGigaOM-banner-F.gif "http://static.fmpub.net/banners/1/6001d3c9500bbf407840d2982f64ade2/33112701646ae625f485fa-07-861\_SunGigaOM-banner-F.gif")
author: mmilo

comments.content:
Sun Bold by Lucas de Groot

[http://www.lucasfonts.com/cgi-bin/loadframe/lucasfnt/sun/sun.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021145344/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/cgi-bin/loadframe/lucasfnt/sun/sun.html "http://www.lucasfonts.com/cgi-bin/loadframe/lucasfnt/sun/sun.html")

Mikey :-)
